channel.title: Making NPCList newNPCList Work on my server

item.title: Making NPCList newNPCList Work on my server
item.dc:creator: @Deathspirit Deathspirit
item.description:
@Deathspirit wrote:

Look in your Client for Class5 then add this

if(i == NPCIDHERE) { class5.aString65 = "NPCNAMEWHATYOUWANTTOCHANGEITTOHERE"; }

Read full topic
item.source: Making NPCList newNPCList Work on my server

item.title: Making NPCList newNPCList Work on my server
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

newNPCList.npcName = Julia_the_Whore;
Nice

Anyways, changing the NPC’s display name is client-sided (class5.java) and i don’t think this should be posted here.

Read full topic
item.source: Making NPCList newNPCList Work on my server

item.title: Making NPCList newNPCList Work on my server
item.dc:creator: @easyrage easyrage
item.description:
@easyrage wrote:

Hi, owner of easyragescape here, just trying to make some funny NPC’s on my serv and I cant edit the names of old NPC’s, so I figure I can make a new NPCList with the right name and same model, and get the proper effect? Instead of Shop_Owner I want Julia_the_Pennywhore, I edited the name on cfg file etc but it doesnt work. if there is better way than this than tell me, if not than id appreciate your help on were to put this!

[code]
NPCList newNPCList = new NPCList(527);{

    		newNPCList.npcName = Julia_the_Whore;
    		newNPCList.npcCombat = 12;
    		newNPCList.npcHealth = 150;
    		NpcList[slot] = 6000;
	}[/code]

ty[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 29, 2009, 12:43:43 pm[/size][hr]Bump, anyone that can help please please please do, its a 317 server, running from an all-star base. anyone know?

Read full topic
item.source: Making NPCList newNPCList Work on my server
